ISSUE.TITLE: Drone crashes when it tries to send build output to non-existing websocket
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I am running drone behing an AWS ELB in http mode, which means that websocket traffic is not supported. I do see `bad request` when I click on `follow` link in the build web console (which is expected).
